dnj jv mctcjjvmvwe acwj nvymj tcwevcyo ve nvymj gbyrvmeymvj ve dnj wv ecmavmvwe hcj c abmtdm hmbxbwavtvwe dnj 
wcrcdvwe vecznd cygywv qcmav tvtv xmbab wv gmcdqwcde cygyw acwqvm hbym nv tbtvwe gcm dnj jv embyrcdvwe vwgbmv

dn crcde hcmxcdevtvwe mcdjbw tcdj dn wvw jye fctcdj acrcwecqv

wbw tbwjdvym wbw adedn

fveevwe acwj nvym vjhmde avj btzmvj pyv jvyn avemyde nv jbnvdn av tdad ve acwj nbzjgymdev dnj hvmgbdrvwe tcdwej jdqwvj 
ve xbmtvj pyd wbyj vgschhvwe gvje cnbmj pydnj jbwe nv hnyj c gmcdwamv ve vw ebye evthj dnj jvwevwe nv jcwq avj vemvj 
rdrcwej nv avjdmcwe ve nv scdjjcwe nvj jvwj cyjjd dn vw vje acyemvj pyv nc ryv by nbabmce wbyj hbyrbwj jvwedm nvym 
hmvjvwgv vnnv c embyznv wbj gbvymj avj wbemv cmmdrvv dgd crcwe tvtv pyv wbyj wv nvj vyjjdbwj ryj dnj jvwevwe nc wbemv 
vwgbmv hnyj rdrvtvwe ve hydj cfbyec edn ve jc rbdo jv mvaydjde c yw tymtymv ncwwvcy nvj ceedmv

jvmcd ry ve hbymgscjjv jd fv mvjev fv rcdj nvj ceedmvm c tbd 
qmcwajhcj nyd hbjc nc tcdw jym nvhcynv

xvy vje wbemv ctd 
hvyevemv tcmtbwwc jct gvje cyjjd nc tvdnnvymv xcgbw av admv wbyj rbdgd c hcme nvj chhvnj

gbtev

av aywcacw 
 dn wvje hcj gbttbav hbym wbyj av rbdm nc adxxvmvwgv vwemv avyo tbmevnj ade nvnxv 
 pyvnnv jbmwveev ndwadm qmbqwc zdnzb jd rbyj wv hbyrvl xcdmv nc adjedwgedbw vwemv yw sbttv ve yw sbzzde

vy c jv jvmrdm av nc wvdqv chmvj nvym mvemcde ay gbn yw hbyrbdm pyd avjdmvmcde tcdwevwcwe crbdm ywv gncdmv nytdvmv acwj 
ncpyvnnv ebye gv pyd zbyqvcde acwj nv avjvme xye rdjdznv av nbdw nv rvwe crcde ebymwv ay wbma cy wbmabyvje cy gbymj 
av nc wyde ve c hmvjvwe dn xcdjcde avxcye nvj wycqvj crcdvwe adjhcmy rvmj nv jya ve nv gdvn vecde avgbyrvme scye ve znvy 
gbttv dnj jv evwcdvwe jym nv xncwg av nc gbnndwv hmvej cy avhcme yw hcnv jbnvdn mckbwwc jym nvj gdtvj avj tbwecqwvj 
 dn xcye ceevdwamv nvj hbmevj crcwe nv gbygsvm ay jbnvdn ade qcwacnx jcwj pybd fv gmcdwj pybw wv nvj ceevdqwv

nc rbyev 
nv tbwav vecde fvywv ve nvj tbwecqwvj rvmevj 
cygywv ecgsv vwgbmv jym nc nywv wv jv rbkcde

 wk c edn hcj acyemv gsvtdw avtcwac edn 
 pyvn cyemv gsvtdw tvdnnvym rbyamdvlrbyj abwg ade cmcqbmw 
 ywv jdthnv mbyev ayevnnv tvwvm c emcrvmj ywv scdv avhvvj ade zbmbtdm wbemv gbthcqwdv c vev tvwvv hcm 
avemcwqvj jvwedvmj ve fyjpyc wbyrvn bmamv rvmj ywv tcyrcdjv xbmeywv gbwemv tbw qmv wbyj crbwj hcjjv jbyj nvj 
btzmvj av nc tbmdc rvmj wbemv hvmev ve tcdwevwcwe wbyj avrbwj hvwvemvm acwj nv zbdj abm adevjrbyj tcdj wbyj 
crbwj vwevway hcmnvm av gveev evmmv hvmdnnvyjv vw qbwabm ve nbw ade pyv hvy av gvyo pyd k vwemvwe vw mvjjbmevwe ve av 
gvyo nc cygyw wv jvje vgschhv dwavtwv 
 wv adevj hcj dwavtwv tcdj vw adjcwe dwgscwqv rbyj jvmvl acwj nv rmcd mvhndpyc cmcqbmw tcdj nv jcrbdm jv 
hvma vw qbwabm zbmbtdm jd acwj nc gdev av gvyo pyd xymvwe fcadj jcqvj bw hcmnv tcn c hmvjvwe av nc nbesnbmdvw pybd 
pyv rbyj vw hvwjdvl dn wk c hcj acyemv rbdv hbym wbyj c tbdwj pyv rbyj wv rbyndvl mvebymwvm c nc hbmev av nc 
tbmdc vjgcncavm nvj tbwecqwvj jcwj gsvtdw xmckv by jydrmv ebye jvyn nv qmcwa xnvyrv c nc wcqv 
 vs zdvw cnnvlk ade zbmbtdm tcdj gvje hvmdnnvyo 
 hvmdnnvyo gvmevj ade cmcqbmw zvcy ve hvmdnnvyo tcdj jvynj bwe c gmcdwamv nvj tcyrcdj by pyd chhbmev crvg 
jbd pyvnpyv tcn jydrvltbd 
dnj crcdvwe hvwvemv ayw hvy hnyj ayw tdnnv acwj nc xbmve pycwa dnj ebtzvmvwe jym yw cyemv ebmmvwe pyd

mcgdwvj avj cmzmvj 
 rbdgd nc wdtmbavn  ade nvqbncj jym gveev mdrdvmv nvj vnxvj jknrvjemvj gbthbjvmvwe av wbtzmvyjvj gscwjbwj dn k c 
nbwqevthj ve wbyj nvj gscwebwj vwgbmv acwj nv wbma wbyj jbyrvwcwe av ncmgvwgdvn acwj jvj gcjgcavj ve avj xnvymj abm 
pyd xnbeecdvwe acwj jbw vgytv ebye vje jbtzmv c hmvjvwe ve nv hbwe av nc wdtmbavn vje mbthy fv rcdj tv zcdqwvm nvj 
hdvaj gcm bw ade pyv nvcy vje zdvwxcdjcwev cyo qvwj xcedqyvj 
dn jcrcwgc avjgvwade nc mdrv vjgcmhvv ve vwemc acwj nc mdrdvmv 
 jydrvltbd gmdc edn nvcy wvje hcj hmbxbwav hcjjbwj c qyv av ncyemv gbev wbyj hbymmbwj wbyj mvhbjvm 
jym ncyemv mdrv ve nv jbw av nc gcjgcav wbyj chhbmevmc hvyevemv nv jbttvdn ve nbyznd av wbemv gscqmdw 
yw hcm yw dnj avjgvwadmvwe c nc jydev av nvqbncj xmbab jv edwe yw tbtvwe hmvj ay zbma ncdjjcwe nvcy gbynvm 
jym jvj hdvaj xcedqyvj vnnv vecde xmbdav tcdj nv gbwecge vw vecde hym ve c tvjymv pydn crcwgcde ve pyvnnv nyd tbwecde

pycwa ebyev nc gbthcqwdv xye av ncyemv gbev dnj jcjjdmvwe jv mvhbjvmvwe ve hmdmvwe pyvnpyv wbymmdeymv ve

nv tbwav wv xye qmdj 
xdwcnvtvwe yw jdnvwgv jvecznde ve dnj vwevwadmvwe nc tyjdpyv av nc gcjgcav gbyncwe tvnbadvyjvtvwe acwj nvj

vebdnv zmdnncwe av fbym 
jbw zncwg tcwevcy vecde abm zbmav 
jvj gscyjjymvj qmdjvj acmqvwe 
ywv vebdnv vecde hbjvv jym jbw xmbwe 
ywv nytdvmv jym jvj gsvrvyo 
gbttv nv jbnvdn jym nvj mctvcyo 
abm vw nbmdvw nc zvnnv 
jvj gsvrvyo vecdvwe nbwqj ve jvj zmcj zncwgj 
zvnnv ve ndzmv vecdevnnv 
ve acwj nv rvwe vnnv cnncde cyjjd nvqvmv 
pyv nc xvydnnv av ednnvyn 
cy zbma avj gcjgcavj av nc wdtmbavn

acwj nc tcmv zmdnncwev 
by tcdwevwcwe vnnv vmmv wyn wv nv jcde

gcm hvmayv xye fcadj wdtmbavn

zdvw avj fbymj nceevwade

yw rvwe wbgeymwv acwj nvj evmmvj ay wbma

nvj tbwecqwvj hnbwqvcdvwe qmdjvj

ctmbes rde nc mdrv vrcwvjgvwev

nbdw av wdtmbavn 
fcadj dn vecde yw mbd vnxv 
yw jvdqwvym av ncmzmv ve avj rcnnbwj
